section.title: Model spy and the Eclipse IDE
section.para:
If installed you can also use the model spy to see the application model of the running Eclipse IDE itself. You can open it via the
Alt Shift F9
shortcut.

warning.para: If you modify the Eclipse IDE model, you should be careful as this might put the running Eclipse IDE into a bad state. To fix such issues, start the Eclipse IDE from the command line with the -clearPersistedState parameter.
